channel.title: Npcs dont fight back on dodian,
channel.description:
All the npcs dont fight back, im using devolution v7,
Is there anyway to fix them all or do i have to edit each monster,

item.title: Npcs dont fight back on dodian,
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

they dont bother to attack back, and were not using ice spells

Read full topic
item.source: Npcs dont fight back on dodian,

item.title: Npcs dont fight back on dodian,
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

They do fight back, but what do you mean? They don’t hit? or they just don’t attack back?

If they aren’t attacking back, it’s because someone is using Ice Spells on them, which makes them not hit back.

Read full topic
item.source: Npcs dont fight back on dodian,
